overview: Luana is one of a few children from an isolated community that lives without running water, electricity or easy access in Cabo Polonio, Uruguay. Through her eyes, we discover a world marked by the violence of the elements, anchored in the solitude of a collective movement still experimenting a social utopia. The wind, the sea, the sun, the endless sand and the animals form a landscape where life hangs on despite everything.
title: Luana
